Detailed Description

Truthfulness assertion for a link.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum MindSpace::MTruthValue::TruthType

TruthType The types of Truthfulness represented by this value.

Enumerator:
SimpleTruth  Simple probability value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive
RangeTruth  A probability range between two values
